subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Seattle’s 14-0 first-quarter lead, which evaporated among Ryan Grant’s runs, Brett Farve’s improvisation and the swirling snow, was forefront for the players as they packed up their lockers.
snippet: Seattle’s 14-0 first-quarter lead, which evaporated among Ryan Grant’s runs, Brett Farve’s improvisation and the swirling snow, was forefront for the players as they packed up their lockers.
